review: The Oral-B Pro Health Gum Care Soft Toothbrush has become our go-to choice for daily dental hygiene. Its consistent performance, combined with the value-packed offer, makes it a staple in our household. Without a doubt, this will remain a repeat purchase for us.
The bristles are hard, not soft.Disappointed with my buy and I bought 8 toothbrushes, sadly!!
Must go for this toothbrush . Very nice toothbrush .
Great Toothbrush. Cleans the whole mouth and has a life of 2 months. Perfect. @160Rs. per pack of 4
Didnt like quality. Received hard bristle in packaging of soft bristle
